    Centos 7 运行firefox出错

    2018, Nov 06    

    Centos 7 在firefox官网下载了最新的安装包，运行后提示

        # firefox
    XPCOMGlueLoad error for file /root/fuzzingbox/firefox/libmozgtk.so:
    libgtk-3.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
    Couldn't load XPCOM.

    提示缺少libgtk-3.so库

    yum install gtk3
    一键分享
